message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $6,500. This is a competitive price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I have to consider my own value for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $6,800. This is a reasonable compromise considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,500. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I don't want to go above that.

I understand that you're still looking for a bit more flexibility, Bob. I'm willing to compromise again and offer the product to you for $6,600. This is the best I can do, considering my own value for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,550. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers.

I understand that you're getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers again and offer the product to you for $6,575. This is the best I can do, considering my own value for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,537.50. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers.

I understand that you're getting very close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $6,565. This is the best I can do, considering my own value for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,532.50. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers.
